name: Flickering Light for Unity: C# script
name_original: Flickering Light for Unity: C# script
description:
https://github.com/cassioKenji...

This script will add a light source to a game object and simulate fire on it, through a flickring effect on.

You can set the range and intensity of the light;
You can set the light color.

Getting Started:
Add it as a script component to your game object.

Done:

-A light source component is required itself now.
-Better visualization into the inspector: spacing, header and tooltip text.
-Controls into Unity Inspector for better customization and parametrization.


*Feel free to use it as you wish. You don't need to give me any credit for it.
